title: Norauto: Employees involvement against COVID-19 challenges and change work organisation
title_national_language: Norauto - o envolvimento de trabalhadores no combate aos desafios trazidos pelo COVID-19 e a mudança na organização do trabalho
category: Ensuring business continuity and support for essential services
subcategory: Change of work arrangements (working time, rota schemes)
background_info_description: Norauto, a company specialised in automotive equipment and maintenance, faced a drop in activity as consequence of COVID-19 pandemic. In order to face these consequences, Norauto was forced to place 40% of its workforce in lay-off and decided to reduce working hours in order to facilitate shifts among workers.
content_of_measure_description: In order to face the consequences of COVID-19 pandemic, Norauto was forced to put 40% of its workforce in lay-off and decided to reduce working hours in order to facilitate shifts among workers. As a way to develop strategies to overcome this crisis, the company created three autonomous teams with different objectives:* recover the past: projects, processes or tools that have not been yet completed;* ongoing projects;* thinking about the best way to get out of the present crisis and identifying opportunities during and after the COVID-19 pandemic.All workers in the various departments, including laid-off workers, were involved in the decisions taken due to COVID-19. A telephone line was created to support workers in lay-off, both for administrative matters and for psychological counselling. The intention is to make these workers feeling included, as part of the company.
use_of_measure_description: All workers have been part of the strategic plan to face the COVID-19 pandemic crisis.
sectors: Wholesale and retail trade and repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles
